General.Name: Aldrees Petroleum & Transport Svcs
General.Description: Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company engages in the wholesale and retail of fuel, gasoline, and oil in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. The company operates through Petroleum Services and Transport Services segments. It operates approximately 640 fuel stations. The company also provides various services related to additives, car wash, tire servicing, alignment, accessories, food, mosque, ATMs, car rental, etc. at its fuel stations. In addition, it offers transport and logistics services through a fleet of approximately 2,699 trucks and trailers. Aldrees Petroleum and Transport Services Company was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Riyadh, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
